tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ****** *** *** ********* *** explained the issue in details with solution. Very happy with my visit and will recommend this doctor to everyone.. such a saviour for me

Dr. Ravneet was extremely warm and patient with me. She guided, encouraged and with her team of nurses she gave me dedicated support. The best part is she told me how natural factors play a role in milk supply and explained thoroughly on how much milk a baby needs to intake and how to balance it.
She looked at my preferences and comfort level and gave recommendations accordingly.
The doctor is absolutely sweet,  reassuring and pleasant. Especially when it comes to babies,  we tend to worry more and getting advise from someone so confident in their field is absolutely amazing.
